title: RAR writes to cache file during a second build
body:
This seems to be a regression introduced by #2632. After the first build, if nothing changed, RAR should not write to its cache file, only read from it.

Perfview trace of commit right before #2632 and some later commit after the regression.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2255729/32252798-7a6fd9f4-be54-11e7-9f54-a3bd409f8f85.png)
